Blog.post: Ugh, I'm so freakin' stressed out. I really need to move out and I made a promise to my bf that I'd find a place in 3 weeks. Well, I don't know how much I'm making at my new job, and from what I estimating now it doesn't look like I'll have enough. I'm so upset.... I don't know what to do anymore. I feel so frusterated at everything. I'm trying to figure all this crap out and it just doesn't seel like I can't ever get ahead in life. I feel like no matter what I do I can't win. Just very frusterated now.
Anyone wanta give me $500? Please?
They cut off the circulation to my brain!
If you're gonna have a comb-over.... don't drive a convertable!

Hm, Well, I decided to start a virus count. This SoBig.f virus (ok Joe, it's a worm, a worm!) is all over the place. Today I counted 9 versions of it in my Bulk Mail folder on my yahoo account. I had a few the day before also... Virus(worm) Count total: 14
10 pennies do not equal $1
Ugh, I have to be at work at 5am tommorow..... so I have to leave here by like 4:15am...... ugh ugh....

My last day at "the Eagle". They got me a cake (a little one, like they get everone else). That made me happy. Plus apparently the sattalite that runs our music messed up when the power went out, and they where playing modern cool stuff. Made my night much better.
Wait, I live in Ohio.... and the lights went out at 4:15pm.... ooh well, they went out. Now they're back on, but soon to go out again, 'cause I'm going to bed. Good Night!
The other day, I was joking aorund with one of the sample ladies in my store... she turned to me and said "Remind me when I go home to stick pins in your doll."

Well, went to look at the cars, waited over an hour to find out they "don't put out the $88 cars until later". I had to go to work, so we couldn't wait around all day. Ooh well. One more week at Giant Eagle. I'm kinda sad, I don't really wanta leave. I'll miss everyone there, they all kinda feel like family to me.
Going tommorow morning to see if we can find a car for my bf. We saw signs for a place that has cars for "as low as $88". Sounds too good to be true, we'll find out.
Wahoo! Hehehe. Well, they want me to go fo an orientation the 16th. I'm happy. Hm, wonder if "The big bird" will want me to stay. lol, doubt it. ooh well :)

Well, today's the day of my job interview. I'm not too nervious yet, but I'll probibly be when i'm ready to go in. Hm, well, after the interview I'm gonna go get my boyfriend and take him to a few places, and we'll hang out. That's about it here... bye for now

See how tired I was, I didn't even realize that tommorow was already today, last night. Wait that would be this morning, ooh nevermind. Ok, my life right now. I have a job interview @ IGA Monday. I really hope I get it, I really ned a full time job, and especialy need the cash! I'm due for a raise at Giant Eagle, which will put me up to $9.75. That's what I put on my application to IGA, and they still called me back for a 2nd interview. I really hope they can give me that pay rate. If I get that, I'll deffinitly be able to get an apartment on my own. I'm getting really tired of living here. I miss being on my own. Ooh well. I think that's all for now. If I think of anything I'm sure I'll be back :) bye for now.
I kinda neglected my old blog, so I decided to attempt to start a new one. I'm gonna try and keep up with this one. I'll post my first real post tommorow. I'm too tired to think now. Good night.
Taking time apart..... I feel so empty..... and lost.
My bf finally moved back with his mom, he moved back home yesterday... So glad, I was getting really concered for him at the other place where he was living... It just makes me feel more at ease...

Tomorrow was supposed to be a happy day in my life. Tomorrow was supposed to be a day of fun. Tomorrow was supposed to be my and my bf's 1 year anniversary. But we didn't get that far. Just feeling kinda alone... Halloween was one of my favorite holidays, but not this year...
I crave an adventure. I would love to try to get on a show like Big Brother, but I don't have a camera for the application. Hm.... any suggestions for an adventure?

Jason, thank you.......

I've had my ups and downs with the whole "taking time apart" thing, but I'm ok with it, I guess. Also, quit my job Thursday, so Now, really bored here..... ugh, Well, I go back to the "eagle" Monday afternoon. I should get rehired. Seems good... I just need something to do around here....
It's getting louder...
3 days off in a row next week...... PA's calling me.....

I hate holidays... well, not really. just hate the nothing-to-do when I'm done with the family stuff... I was super tempted to make another road trip to PA, but After figuring out a time frame in my mind, it's just not worth it. If I had tomorrow off I'd be there right now though. But with what I work, I have to wake up here at 6:30am :( I hope work is easy tomorrow.... at least I get to watch SmackDown tonight...
Happy Thanksgiving... we already ate here... now nothing to do.... lol

Wow I was just so bored I watched most of SummerSlam '94. Undertaker vs. Undertaker a classic. And where would Owen Hart be if he where still alive. Without a doubt multi-time WWE champ...

To see you when I wake up is a gift I didn't think could be real To know that you feel the same way as I do is a three-old utopian dream. You do something to me that I can't explain. SO would I be out of like if I said, I miss you. (?) I see your picture, I smell your skin on the empty pillow next to mine. You have only been gone 10 days, but already I'm wasting away. I know I'll see you again whether far or soon. But I need you to know that I care and I miss you.
I'm bored. Listing to Madonna "Ray of Light" CD (her best to date) and waiting for RAW to finish taping so I get to watch it. Missing Jason..... that's about it hehe
Ok, who wants to take over my life here in Ohio, so I can go and move to PA?? Come on, going once..... going twice.....

I blew Jason a kiss right before I turned to get on to the highway, but I wasn't sure if he got it. Yes he did. That put a smile on my face. Arg! Why can't u be closer?!

I had SOO much fun these past days. I left Thursday afternoon, and I went to PA to visit my friend. OMG what a blast it was. I so didn't wanta leave today. But I had to, I have work. But it was sooo nice to be there, and have no worries. And it was nice to have someone to cuddle with in bed :) Also his roommate is hilarious (MOM!!). Love ya Donna. :) I so wanta go back. SOON!

Yea, I'm good at that. Well got his side of it, and everything is ok. He's just not ready for a relationship and stuff... and I understand, but I guess I was still trying to push things along. My fault, lol. But everything is all better now. :)

So mad and upset now. Just found out Jason said I was too clingy and stuff. I really liked him, and I assumed he felt the same way, guess not. I didn't drive 3 hours both times just for a booty call. Men suck!

I saw Justin Timberlake shopping in the mall with his mom, and I went up and asked for an autograph, and we ended up hanging out and he came to my hours and stuff... (now why did I waste the celeb sex dream on Madonna!?).
Well, christmas is pretty much over for me, at least all the events of it. My grandmother came over and we ate. Had a lovely conversation about her bowel movements... that's about it. Fun, fun.
I got a DVD recorder :-D very happy!
Hm, just had a dream that I had sex with Madonna. Odd....

Just talked to my ex bf on the phone. He had called right before I got home, so I retutned his call. It was strange talking to him. And honestly, I really don't know what to say about it, and I don't know how I feel about it.

I think the christmas spirit has passed me by... just don't feel very christmasy this year. The lack of funds is big part of it, I have no $ to buy anyone anything and that sucks, I love buying stuff for people(which is why i have no $, haha). Ooh well.
a sence of direction, haha...... (I'm not lost, I'm just not where I wanta be!)

I need more gay friends..... sad, closest I get to gay culture is watching Queer Eye for the Straight Guy (though I LOVE the show). I really only have one gay friend that I hang out with (love ya Joe). Ooh well....

Just found out that my ex bf's father passed away. I haven't talked to Brett since that phone call. But I do feel a sadness for him. I know he was struggling with the fact that his father was ill. And he said he didn't expect his father to make it to Christmas, guess he was right. I have the urge to send a card or something, but I'm not going to. He said to leave him alone, and I will do it.
Now, I don't normally get into politics, but this is some great news. Now we just need to find Osama.......

Probably something not to be proud of but I'm officially a label whore!! Well, for underwear only. I love my 2(x)ist underwear!! just need to find some more... cheap. I don't wanta pay full price..... Hm, wanta buy me some, e-mail me for my type preference, and size :)

I got this in an e-mail from someone I haven't talked to in quite awhile. Now I'm not one for fowards. I lothe them. Especially the ones that say something like "send this to 85 of your closest friend, or u'll die by sunset" or something.... this this one really made sence, so here it is... They call it the "Quarter-life Crisis." It is when you stop going along with the crowd and start realizing that there are many things about yourself that you didn't know and may not like. You start feeling insecure and wonder where you will be in a year or two, but then get scared because you barely know where you are now. You start realizing that people are selfish and that, maybe, those friends that you thought you were so close to aren't exactly the greatest people you have ever met, and the people you have lost touch with are some of the most important ones. What you don't recognize is that they are realizing that too, and aren't really cold, catty, mean or insincere, but that they are as confused as you. You look at your job... and it is not even close to what you thought you would be doing, or maybe you are looking for a job and realizing that you are going to have to start at the bottom and that scares you. Your opinions have gotten stronger. You see what others are doing and find yourself judging more than usual because suddenly you realize that you have certain boundaries in your life and are constantly adding things to your list of what is acceptable and what isn't. One minute, you are insecure and then the next, secure. You laugh and cry with the greatest force of your life. You feel alone and scared and confused. Suddenly, change is the enemy and you try and cling on to the past with dear life, but soon realize that the past is drifting further and further away, and there is nothing to do but stay where you are or move forward. You get your heart broken and wonder how someone you loved could do such damage to you. Or you lie in bed and wonder why you can't meet anyone decent enough that you want to get to know better. Or maybe you love someone but love someone else too and cannot figure out why you are doing this because you know that you aren't a bad person. One night stands and random hook ups start to look cheap. Getting wasted and acting like an idiot starts to look pathetic. You go through the same emotions and questions over and over, and talk with your friends about the same topics because you cannot seem to make a decision. You worry about loans, money, the future and making a life for yourself... and while winning the race would be great, right now you'd just like to be a contender! What you may not realize is that everyone reading this relates to it. We are in our best of times and our worst of times, trying as hard as we can to figure this whole thing out. Send this to your twenty-something friends...maybe it will help someone feel like they aren't alone in their state of confusion........
There is no one on-line to talk to, and I'm bored!!!

Also, I really wanta go to PA and be with Jason, but I don't know if I can just uproot myself, especially that far. Also, I don't know if I'm ready for a relationship. After how I was burned with my last relationship.... scared of it happening again. ugh... what to do, what to do....

We'll see after I get back from the garage.

I looked over at the guy and I saw him mouth "March?!" I just shrugged my shoulders. Actually not that far away. I hope I get in. I need something more steady then what I'm gettin right now. Holding you make me feel complete. I feel safe when you're around. I'd do anything to make you happy, and to see that fire behind your eyes. I don't like seeing you hurt. And I wish I could make it all go away like u asked. But I can't change the past. I can just be here for you now. And now is all that matters. One day you will come up to me and ask, "What is more important; me or your life?" I will answer "My life." And you will walk away, never knowing that you are my life...

mood: content I started writing a story, Chris got me on a little vampire kick. Here's what I have so far :) As I sat on the roof, I stared at the night sky; vast darkness with tiny pinholes of light, the soft orange city-glow just on the horizon in the west. I could see my breath, but I wasn’t cold. It was a beautiful night. I hate beautiful nights. I wished for just one cloud. At least it was a new moon tonight. I didn’t like the moon’s face starting down on me, eyes always watching. But tonight there was no moon, just stars. I could feel the dry blood on my chin. I liked the feeling of it when it was fresh and warm, now it was dry and lifeless. It had no meaning anymore, now it was just… blood. I looked towards the city-glow. I didn’t want to be there tonight. That’s why I was here. I did what I had to tonight, then got out of there. I did not want to run into them . I couldn’t stay out of the city long though, they would fine me out here. Also the city had what I needed. I felt eyes on me… someone was watching me. They wouldn’t do anything out here, I knew that much. I didn’t even try to see who it was. They knew that I could sense them, that’s what made this sadistic game of cat and mouse more fun. Only thing they didn’t know was is that I am the cat. I still didn’t move. I sat until I could see the first hint of daybreak. I climbed into the open window, closing it behind me. Drew the shades, and climbed into the bed, pulling the covers over my head. “Good Morning.” I said to no one in particular, and then drifted to sleep.
mood: ~smiles~ I saw a rainbow as I was driving home from work. Another happy sign. :) Also thanx for everyone who's posted to here, And thank you Scott :)

mood: bewildered I was driving home tonight from Chris's, and I listened to "When You Come Back Down" by Nickel Creek. Chris had played it earlier, but I didn't really listen to it. This time I did, and it made me cry a little, especially the line My greatest fear will be, that you will crash and burn, and I won't feel your fire and the line And I'll be on the other end, To hear you when you call, Angel, you were born to fly, If you get too high I'll catch you when you fall After that song I just shut off the radio and thought for the rest of my drive home. When I was almost home, I saw something go thru the sky for a brief second, then it disappeared. It couldn't have been a plane since it disappeared in mid air, then I realized it was a clear night, so it must have been a shooting star. I was kinda bewildered by it, but I took it as a song that everything is going to be ok, and kind of put my worries at ease a little. A little sign that I'm doing something right with everything. Well, it's time for bed.

I'm glad everything is getting back to normal, well as normal as it will be for a while. As I said no one's perfect and I love you with all you're imperfections. You are my world. I love you.

Down, sad depressed. I don't know where to stand. I don't want to be here, I don't want to be anywhere. I wanta be left alone, but I want someone with me. I want my pain to go away, but I want others to be happy, so my pain must stay for them to be happy. But then that doesn't make them happy, because I'm not happy. Tears roll down my cheeks. My stomach ties itself in knots. I'm so tired of being this perfect guy that no one wants. I'm tired of being a best friend. I'm tired of being so perfect. But I'm scared of loosing everyone and everything.

mood:~sigh~ Just a little message to my bf. Baby don't blame yourself... Things will get better and you'll get your "little brother" back eventually. Just know I love you, and u know it worries me when u get all upset over stuff.

mood:goofy I bent over and picked up a penny the other day, and said to my bf, "Hey Chris, look I bend over for a penny. You should see what I do for a quarter..." He asked me, "Well what would you do for a whole roll of quarters?" My reply "Well just lube me up and spread me out!!"

Then later I'm taking Chris to Steak and Shake, it's where I took him on our first one month anniversy :). happy anniversy babe, I love you. Avec tous mon coeur et mon âme, je vous aime plus que n'importe quelle langue peut dire. With all my heart and soul, I love you more than any language can say.
